name: Unstable Ship (Quanta Studios, Swegrock)
description:
Save The Ship!

Can you save the ship before it’s too late?

Fight off fires, lack of oxygen and faulty electrics while trying to rebuild your ship to warp away from danger.

Solve puzzles while making sure your ship doesn’t burn alive, self-destruct, or you run out of oxygen!


How To Play

Use WASD and a Mouse to control your first-person character, and shift to run!

Press E to interact, or pick up objects.

Click to active the fire extinguisher!

This game is best played in the desktop version, but it is available in WebGL!

Speedrunning

See how fast you can beat the game!

Can you beat our best time of 44.17 seconds?


Behind The Scenes

This game was made by Aidan and Seb for the Ludum Dare 49 game jam.

Made using Unity, Blender and Audacity!
